mean_cn: n. 中场休息时间，半工半薪
mean_en: the short period of time between the two parts of a sporting event such as a football, rugby, or basketball game, when the players have a short rest.
sentence: In our half-time break, we talked about how to do better in the second half of the game.
sentence_trans: 在中场休息时间，我们谈论了怎样在下半场比赛中表现得更好。
